description:
The request for a 'puppet user group' stand is submitted today.

As previous years, all puppet groups are invited to get involved.

* present your user group at the stand

* provide flyers in your native language to present your user group

* just pop by and say hello when visiting fosdem

* submit ideas to promote puppet user groups

More info will follow at the right time
name: Puppet user group stand @ fosdem

description: Have to see what we can do as PUG on this event. Planning to hanging around those days wearing the coolest BPUG T-Shirts and meeting other PUG members.

venue.name: SchoonMeersen Campus of the University College Gent

name: ConfigManagementCamp

description:
Puppet Contributor Summits are events for both existing and new contributors to Puppet, related projects, and modules:

People who submit pull requests and contribute code to our projects
Community members working on related projects
Contributors to Puppet Labs modules or to the Puppet Forge
Key community members who answer a lot of questions about using Puppet
Long-time Puppet users who are interested in doing more

Register also @ http://contributorsummitfeb2015.eventbrite.com/

venue.name: SchoonMeersen Campus of the University College Gent

name: Puppet Contributor Summits
